entry.title: Editor - document #256: OCCI SLAs specification extension
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to rejected
  • Assignee deleted (Gregory Katsaros)

The OCCI chairs asked us to freeze this submission, as it seems to need synchronization with other OCCI documents. We put this submission into 'REJECTED' state, and would like to ask kindly for resubmission once the document is in sync with the related OCCI efforts.

Thanks!
